title: Characterize Rice Export Composition and Correlation with Domestic Production Metrics
problem_statement: Analyze the distribution of rice varieties exported to Bangladesh and their relationship with national production metrics. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness by filtering to 2018-19 to 2022-23 (export data) and 2020-21 to 2024-25 (production data) where completeness exceeds 75%.

join_plan.notes: Join on financial year (2018-19 to 2022-23) where both datasets have ≥75% non-null values. Map 'Rice' in production data to all 'Description' entries in export data.

transform_ideas: Normalize export quantities by total annual rice production
Calculate year-over-year growth rates for exports and production
feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop rows with missing values in joined year columns (≤25% missingness)

validation_plan: Cross-validate export quantity trends against production totals using Pearson correlation (r ≥ 0.6 expected for basmati/broken rice)
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null values in all joined columns
Confirm production data 'Total' season aligns with export data calendar years
expected_outputs: Top 5 rice variety export profiles by volume/value (2018-2022)
Heatmap of export quantity vs. production correlation by year
Stacked bar chart of rice type composition over time
